original_text: He put the special bread on the table as an offering to the Lord, as the Lord had commanded him.
korean_text: 또 여호와 앞 그 상 위에 떡을 진설하니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: He put the special bread on the table
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 특별한 빵을 상 위에 놓았다

sentences.original_text: as an offering to the Lord
as the Lord had commanded him
